methods.name: takeScreenshot
methods.description: Takes a screenshot of a given URL

params.description: The URL to take a screenshot of
params.name: url

params.description:
An array of buttons to click before taking the screenshot. Useful for
clearing any popups or modals that appear on your first visit to a site.
params.name: clickTheseFirst

returns.description: A promise that resolves to an arraybuffer containing the screenshot

examples:
const response = await worker.takeScreenshot('https://example.com', ['Close'])
const img = await response.arrayBuffer()

methods.name: random
methods.description: Generates a random number. This is extra random because it had to travel half way around the world to be generated.

returns.description: A message containing a super duper random number
